game.description: The village of Oakwood has been plagued by a series of mysterious disappearances. The villagers are too afraid to investigate, and the local lord is offering a reward for anyone brave enough to get to the bottom of it.
game.objective: Find out what's behind the disappearances in Oakwood village

tasks.description: Speak to the villagers and gather information about the disappearances
Investigate the nearby forest where some of the disappearances occurred
Confront the source behind the disappearances and put an end to it

game.title: The Missing Villagers of Oakwood
